pageProduct.name: The Hemp Company Rich Conditioning Mask 150ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

Common Uses

For extra conditioning for hair

Ingredients

Aqua (Water), Cetearyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Panthenol, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil, Cannabis Sativa (Hemp) Seed Oil, Parfum (Fragrance), Tocopherol, Potassium Sorbate, Phenoxyethanol, Citric Acid, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Collagen (Marine), Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Silk Amino Acids, Broussonetia Papyrifera (Paper Mulberry) Bark Extract, Benzyl Alcohol

Directions

Apply to wet hair and gently massage in. Leave for 5 minutes. Rinse
